title: Odohu
author: Odohu
content: The word "Conspiracy theory became so popularly in 2020 follow the outbreak of covid19 in late 2019. Many of those described as conspiracy theorist believe that there is a group of people call the deep states that control the world economy, the media, politics and power. However, the advent of social media have created different perspectives in media reportage and is even the reason we know certain things that goes on in different parts of the world. So, what does the conspiracy theorist say about major global events that should catch our attention?First is covid19 that the conspiracy theorist believed was not a pandemic but a "plandemic" , meaning it was planned and implemented by the deep states to disrupt world's economy, seize powers and control humanity. Actually, during the pandemic of covid19, we were actually living according to the dictates of the scientist and health experts and some of the policies introduced and measures taken shows there was more to covid19 than a disease outbreak. Businesses were crippled,  supply chains destroyed and people plunged into poverty in a bid to supposedly combat a virus that till date no one can explain where and how it stopped being a pandemic. Does this make the conspiracy theorists right? That I don't know!Second phase of the conspiracy theory is the plan of the deep state to reduced world population. According to them, if they cannot use a disease outbreak, they have to use war. The conspiracy theorist believe that the war in Ukraine, Sudan and the recent war looming around in Niger and West Africa are all part of the plan... "throw the world into chaos and anarchy, let them kill themselves so the population will reduce". From various projections by the conspiracy theorists, if nothing is done, there will be war in Africa(happening in Sudan, Somalia with tension building in Niger, Mali, Guniea, Bokina Faso and the entire West Africa), Europe (Already happening in Ukraine with possibilities of escalating) and Asia ( Lybia was used as a test, Iran, Iraq,  Syria, Yemen etc. Taiwan and Hong-Kong might be used as the puppet to involve China). There are more events that seems abnormal in the world which the conspiracy theorists connected, but to make it brief, I will not share them here.But are these mere coincidences or the conspiracy theorist are partly right or entirely right?

comments.body: In general, the only conspiracy theorists who are right all the time, are among the ones who don't make a bunch of conspiracy theories.In general, the conspiracy theorists almost never go deep enough with their theories, meaning, there are way more conspiracies, and deeper ones than anyone talks about.The idea that covid is a conspiracy theory is totally wrong. If you want to see the proof, look at the videos starting in 2002 at this site - https://www.bitchute.com/channel/okiFK5CwQrZS/. There are many other sites with loads of doctors and professionals and experts who show that covid is conspiracy, not a theory.The reason why evil conspiracies fail is, the conspirators are not smart enough to out-think God... and in many cases, people who are against them.Many people fully vaccinated for covid are now going BLINDhttps://vaccines.news/2022-04-28-many-people-fully-vaccinated-covid-going-blind.htmlBut there is another concerning side effect occurring in the "fully vaccinated" for the Wuhan coronavirus (COVID-19) that is rarely mentioned: blindness.The latest data out of the United Kingdom suggests that a growing number of fully jabbed people are losing their eyesight. The Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) Yellow Card system currently shows 163 cases of total blindness among people who got jabbed with the Pfizer-BioNTech needle, along with an additional six cases of central vision loss and four cases of sudden visual loss.Twenty-one people also reportedly now suffer from "blindness transient" specifically caused by the Pfizer injection. This adverse reaction involves visual disturbance or loss of sight in one eye for a few seconds or even minutes at a time.Another 20 people beyond that are reported to have suffered from a reaction called "unilateral blindness," which is when a person got blind or blurred vision in just one eye (Related: Roman Abramovich recently suffered temporary blindness while attempting to broker peace talks between Russia and Ukraine; was he recently vaccinated?)"In total, there have been 8,016 eye disorders reported as adverse reactions to the Pfizer jab as of 6th April 2022," reported the Daily Exposé.Is it worth possibly going blind just to feel "protected" against a cold?The AstraZeneca injection, which is one of the COVID jabs currently available in the U.K., is also linked to cases of blindness.As of April 6, the MHRA has received 324 reports of blindness, three reports of central vision loss, five reports of sudden visual loss, and 29 reports of blindness transient among 14,895 eye disorders, all specifically linked to the AstraZeneca needle.Moderna also jabs people in the UK, though at a much smaller rate than the aforementioned companies. Still, many people who take the Moderna needle are now blind as well.The MHRA shows that in conjunction with the Moderna injection, there have been 34 reports of blindness and 56 reports of visual impairment. In total, there have been 1,519 eye disorders reported as adverse reactions to the Moderna jab....

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Note that conspiracy theorists are almost never right. Why not? Because any two or more people who get together are forming a conspiracy. Friends who go out to eat are forming a conspiracy at the restaurant table. Families who eat together in the dining room are forming a conspiracy. Conspiracy theorists aren't right, because they limit their talk to theory, not conspiracy. So, the conspirators who call others conspiracy theorists, are conspiracy theorists themselves... the real conspiracy theorists.

Because as you said, the outbreak that happened a few years ago (covid 19), the ongoing wars (in West Africa, Europe, Asia). All of these things always have a peculiarity that is always smelled by society, and these oddities are sometimes seen and heard clearly. But strangely, if the things that have happened and are happening right now, you could say that these events have succeeded in outwitting the world's people. Regardless of whether it's a conspiracy theory or not, the point is that all these events are very suspicious.So basically, I believe the conspiracy theory really exists. Because sometimes conspiracy theories, in my opinion, don't all end badly, but they can also have a positive impact on human life. But the majority, this conspiracy theory is always associated with the name of a crime plan committed by a certain group. Even so, we as ordinary humans, can do nothing to stop any conspiracy theory.
